detailed_results.claim: ATOM provides unified task and project management across multiple platforms (Asana, Notion, Trello, Jira)
ATOM provides unified calendar management with conflict detection and multi-platform support (Google, Outlook)
ATOM provides advanced hybrid search combining semantic and keyword search across documents, meetings, and notes
ATOM provides AI-powered workflow automation with natural language processing
ATOM is ready for real-world usage with all core features implemented
recommendations: deepseek: 2. **Improve specificity**: Define what "core features" and "real-world usage" mean in measurable terms

detailed_results.claim: Identify any missing features, incomplete integrations, or critical bugs in ATOM application
recommendations: deepseek: 3. **Improve Evidence**: Report on type errors, security tests, and user-facing bugs explicitly.

critical_findings.claim: ATOM provides unified calendar management with conflict detection and multi-platform support (Google, Outlook)
